cyclone.name: CRISTOBAL
cyclone.current_location: about 50 mi WSW of Campeche, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Meandering in the southern Bay of Campeche through mid-week, then forecast to lift northward toward the central Gulf of Mexico late in the 5-day period
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Potential northern Gulf Coast (location still uncertain – guidance later points toward Louisiana)

weather_observation.watch_coast: None for the U.S.; Tropical Storm Watch/Warning only in Mexico from Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz
weather_observation.warning_coast: Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, Mexico (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Bay of Campeche coast of Mexico during the next 72 h; possible north-central Gulf Coast late period
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (nearest listed locations are Veracruz MX, Frontera MX – all > 500 nm away)
weather_observation.first_hazard: None expected at the port within 5 days
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at Plaquemines Port District, LA through the 5-day forecast window
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected in the next 5 days
weather_observation.rainfall: None of the heavy rainfall core expected to reach the port in the next 5 days
